title: Yunnanese seared beef with mint, fermented chilli bean, lime and lemongrass dressing
description: Yunnanese food is a variant of Chinese cuisine which often uses fermented beancurds. Serve with a simple salad or stir-fried vegetables.
serves: Serves 2 as a main or 4 as a starter
ingredients: 5cm/2in piece cucumber, peeled and chopped into bite-sized pieces
12 mint leaves, deep-fried, plus 8 fresh mint leaves to garnish
